summary.en: Deeper in the code, further in the world. Passionate about building scalable software solutions and enhancing user experiences.
summary.zh: 深入程式碼核心，探索更廣闊的世界。熱衷於建構可擴展的軟體解決方案並提升使用者體驗。

details.en: Deveploped and optimized backend services for loan system. Implemented microservices architecture to improve scalability and maintainability.
details.zh: 開發並優化貸款系統後端服務。實作微服務架構以提升擴展性與可維護性。

achievements.zh: 重構 Credit Loan（信⽤貸款）系統

實作 SSO/OAuth 登入系統

achievements.en: Setup Test Environment for Projects （Esso, UserInfo, OracleDb, Redis)
achievements.zh: 建置專案測試環境（Esso, UserInfo, OracleDb, Redis)

details.en: Developed payment processing systems and integrated third-party APIs. Led a team of developers to enhance system performance and reliability.
details.zh: 開發支付處理系統並整合第三方 API。帶領開發團隊提升系統效能與可靠性。

achievements.en: Import hexagonal architecture knowledge for members
achievements.zh: 引入 Hexagonal Architecture (六角架構) 知識

achievements.zh: 擔任實習團隊 Scrum Master

achievements.en: Host refactor workshop for Intern Team

考取 CKAD (Certified Kubernetes Application Developer) 證照

achievements.en: Host DevOps workshop, teaching about Docker and K8s
achievements.zh: 舉辦 DevOps Workshop，教學 Docker 與 K8s

achievements.en: As a speaker at GDG for twice
achievements.zh: 擔任 GDG 講者兩次

achievements.en: Representing Titansoft at the GDG dinner
achievements.zh: 代表 Titansoft 參加 GDG 晚宴

achievements.en: Refactoring legacy code and fix the 2-year-old bugs
achievements.zh: 重構 Legacy Code 並修復存在兩年的 Bug

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.sub_title: National Yunlin University of Science and Technology, YunTech

details.en: Graduated with honors. Researched on Blockchain technology and Network Security. Developed a thesis on secure payment transmission protocol.
details.zh: 榮譽畢業。研究區塊鏈技術與網路安全。開發安全支付傳輸協議之論文。

details.en: Study on Blockchain and Network Security Research Area
details.zh: 主修區塊鏈與網路安全研究領域
